# attributedString

**Instance Property**

An attributed string that represents the string the framework displays for this element taking into account markers and the indentation level of the list element.

## Declaration

```swift
var attributedString: NSAttributedString { get }
```

## Accessing the formatted string data

- **contents**: The text list element contents without markers and formatting.

items.description: The text list element contents without markers and formatting.
items.name: contents

title: attributedString
